metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39801 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: In ion_ioctl of ion-ioctl.c, there is a possible use after free due toimproper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-209791720References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
